comp-budget-rule.budget-exceed-warn-message: Allocation total exceeds budget, do you want to save?

comp-config.comp-instruction: <font size="2">Review the final figure for each component of the compensation plan for your group.</font>
This page is used for Long Term Incentive allocations.

Use this grid to plan or allocate bonus for your group. Click on the Edit icon for more details about each member's bonus component. A proposed allocation is suggested by the system, based on each team member's goal attainments and weighting. You can adjust the calculated amount using the Adjustment field.

Note that our Company Performance for 2010 was 125% of target, and individual targets reflect this company performance.

This form is used to produce Compensation Statements for all International employees.

The Compensation Statement logic will use the imported fields, unless an Override value is entered.
  • Override text values will be used on the Compensation Statement if the Override field is not blank
  • Override numeric values will be used on the Compensation Statement as follows:
    • If a numeric Override field contains a negative number (<0), a zero will be used on the Compensation Statement
    • If a numeric Override field contains a positive number (>0), that value will be used on the Compensation Statement
    • If a numeric Override field contains a zero (=0), the Override value will be ignored on the Compensation Statement
